# The `ReservoirSampler` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Randomly selects an item by sampling into a set with an unknown number of elements, which may each be weighted to be more likely choices. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, typename GenT&gt;
class llvm::ReservoirSampler&lt;T, GenT&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Randomly selects an item by sampling into a set with an unknown number of elements, which may each be weighted to be more likely choices.

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/random-h">Random.h</a>.
